name: Project kickoff
notes: Project control point aligned to modernization scope.

name: 30% design complete
notes: Design progress gate; verify discipline packages and freeze IFC set.

name: Long-lead POs placed
notes: Issue POs for long-lead items (turbine parts, DCS hardware, major valves).

name: 90% design / IFC
notes: Design progress gate; verify discipline packages and freeze IFC set.

name: Outage start / mobilization
notes: Begin outage window; lock LOTO, mobilize contractors, stage materials.

name: Mechanical complete
notes: All mechanical scopes installed; start pre-commissioning checklists.

name: Commissioning complete
notes: I&C loop checks, startups, performance tests; punchlist burn-down.

name: Return to service
notes: Unit synchronized; performance KPIs stable; closeout docs started.
